definition: constitution of the human body, to develop and grow
details:
noun
- constitution of the human body
= synonyms: physique
- alternative names for the body of a human being
= synonyms: shape
verb
- to develop and grow
= example: to develop and grow
- to form or accumulate steadily
= example: to form or accumulate steadily
= synonyms: progress
- to bolster or strengthen
= example: to bolster or strengthen
= synonyms: work up, build up, ramp up
- to found or ground
= example: to found or ground
- to make by combining materials and parts
= example: to make by combining materials and parts
= synonyms: make
- to build or establish something abstract
= example: to build or establish something abstract
= synonyms: establish
- to be engaged in building
= example: to be engaged in building
- to give form to, according to a plan
= example: to give form to, according to a plan
- to order, supervise, or finance the construction of
= example: to order, supervise, or finance the construction of
